channel.title: Displaying an image when an item is clicked on
channel.description: i wanted to make a item, that when choosing the option "look at", it would display sprite on screen until you pressed any key, then it would vanish. thats all id like know.

item.title: Displaying an image when an item is clicked on
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

Dan0194:

You need to be more specific do you want a custom interface? If you want to change item actions you can do it client-sided in the ItemDef file if non-renamed(class5 or class8) can’t remember. Your server probably does not have key actions I made a snippet on how to create a custom packet for key actions http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/564668-key-actions-creating-custom-packet.html

This is RSC. completely different from RS2

Read full topic
item.source: Displaying an image when an item is clicked on
